title: Starlight Highway
chorus:
Roll on, starlight highway, guide me through the night
Silver dreams on the skyline, everything feels right
Roll on, starlight highway, carry me back home
Under the moon we're flying, never more alone

title: Coffee in the Rain
chorus:
Coffee in the rain, we're laughing at the storm
Dripping with the day, but in your arms I'm warm
Coffee in the rain, the world can fade away
Every drop that falls is a song that wants to stay

title: City of Echoes
chorus:
City of echoes, calling out my name
Neon reflections, setting hearts aflame
City of echoes, where stories intertwine
Lost in the rhythm, your heartbeat next to mine
